data.title: its okay!
data.text: previously they had buffet i must say low cost. but now its too costly. but overall they are good. the only problem is with parking.

data.title: Good food
data.text: Good food, hard to communicate with wait staff, had an enjoyable meal for 2 and would return for the fabulous curry

data.title: Gem of a find in Yonkers
data.text: I was introduced to this little jewel about 2 months ago through an invitation from a friend.  It has become a weekly destination.  The food here is authentic and incredibly delicious.  As simple as naan is in theory, it is always served warm and prepared beautifully.  Our favorite dishes are Buttered Chicken, Balti Chicken and Tikka Masala.  The meals come with a fresh salad and 2 homemade dressings.  The service is friendly and consistent.  The prices are reasonable.  Great meal!

data.title: Best Indian food we've had in New York!
data.text: Our favorites are the Chicken Tikka Masala, Paleek Paneer, Chana Masala,Chicken Lollipops. We eat her about once a week. This place is so good, all other Indian food we've had is no where near as tasty in comparison. They do an excellent job and their staff is wonderful too. You can't go wrong with Nawab!

data.title: A Taste of India
data.text: The food was very tasty and the place was very clean. They will remove cheese from the dishes if you're vegan. They have spicy and not spicy food.

data.title: Disrespectful people
data.text: I need to start of by saying please do not give this establishment any of your money! I have never been so disrespected in my life. When we sat down it took 10 mins or longer just to get a menu. When we finally were ready to order and gave the waiter our restaurant.com certificate he went into the kitchen came back and told us that "they do not take the 25 restaurant.com certificate bc it is not real, they only accept 10.00 ones. I told them to verify the validity of this certificate by calling the Company with the number they have on the paper. The guy just repeated what he said. I asked to speak with the person in charge. He proceeded to tell me the person will come soon. We waited 15/20 mins with no manager or a single word spoken! We just left! That is probably what they wanted. I don't care how the food is. The people do not care about whether or not they have your business. A big part of a good business is the people and the service they provide. Do not eat here!!

data.title: Delicious meal at a reasonable price
data.text: My husband picked this restaurant, as he wanted some Indian food and was intrigued by their offering of a buffet.  Unfortunately, it wasn't made clear on their website that the "daily" buffet wasn't available on Sunday, at least not the day we went there.  After getting over the initial disappointment, we reviewed their special luncheon menu.  Pricing for your entree, which includes Naan and rice, was $8.99 pp.  They did provide us each with bottled water, which they charged extra for.  I didn't have an issue with this; however, you should be aware there's an extra charge for beverages.  The gentleman who waited on us was very polite and professional and the meals were served very quickly. My husband and my daughter's boyfriend both ordered the Chili Chicken, my daughter ordered the White Lentil entree and I ordered one of my favorite entrees, the Palak Paneer.  I took a taste of both my husband's and daughter's entrees and, I can tell you, all three of these were very flavorful and absolutely delicious!  The Naan was fresh, warm and soft.  The rice was also very good and complimented our dishes perfectly.  The venue itself is small, but very nicely decorated and has high ceilings that give it a more spacious feeling.  All-in-all, we enjoyed the restaurant and plan to go back for the buffet.....but will be sure to call ahead to ensure they're serving it on the day we plan to go.

data.title: Oh So Spicy!
data.text:
First visit to this little neighborhood spot.It isn't very big but well laid out. The aromas got me when I entered,so good! The chicken appitizer we shared was enough for four people. I had a shrimp dish in a creamy curry sauce(and I look forward to having the rest tonight!) which looked like it wasn't very much but I was wrong. My partner had a chicken dish in a cury,also very good as was the garlic nam. I would have prefered more vegetables on the plate. They did serve a salad plate of lettuce,tomato,& cucumber. White rice also served.
The gratis rice pudding we shared was the best I've had in years!

data.title: Great Buffett
data.text: Went last Saturday to try this recomended Indian Restaurant and was not disappointed. There is parking in alot about 50feet from the restaurant reserved for guests. The buffett has avergood selection from salad to dessert. While the dishes are mostly chicken They are prepared several ways all tasting GREAT. Several vegtables including rice and potatoes. Nann bread served at the table Service was top notch and the food was refilled as needed. Cost avery resonable $13.95 for all you can eat You can not beat it The buffett is Saturday and Sunday  Saw the menu for lunch specials during the week We ceretainly will return

data.title: Good Indian/Pakistani food in historic location
data.text: Nawab is a very good Indian/Pakistani restaurant in downtown Yonkers located on the ground floor of the historic Grand Roosevelt Ballroom. Excellent tikki masala, samosas, naan and vegetable entrees. A lunch buffet is now available only for dining in - was previously for takeout too. The staff and service are very eager to please and they are warm and friendly.

data.title: Amazing food
data.text: Very impressed by the freshness of their food. One of the best restaurant I have ever been to, the food is amazing. You can tell its freshly made. Everything I ordered was made perfectly based on my request. its a place that would definatlty save everybody a trip to Queens or city to go eat halal food and the quality is the best. The service is amazing the owners are so welcoming and friendly. In such short period of time they have done very well and are still very eager to improve the restuarant and the attached beautiful ballroom they have for events of all sort.   I defiantly recommend it.
